author: Albert Stevens Crockett
description: A rye whiskey-based New York Sour without egg white. This Sour has the good looks and also the flavour profile to back them up.
name: Brunswick
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
